mapper.select: select mbsp_id, MBSP_NAME, MBSP_EMAIL, MBSP_PASSWORD, MBSP_ZIPCODE, MBSP_ADDR, MBSP_DEADDR, MBSP_PHONE, MBSP_NICK, MBSP_RECEIVE, MBSP_POINT, MBSP_LASTLOGIN, MBSP_DATESUB, MBSP_UPDATEDATE from mbsp_tbl where mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id}
